Guys. A bit late to the track discussion. It doesn‚Äôt matter if slow but please watch your track etiquette especially if first time. Everyone starts somewhere. Remember if you see someone coming up fast  just pull to the side and let them overtake. Especially if you see a car going for that hot lap (going for timing). Let them pass early since you‚Äôre a slower car. Don‚Äôt go and block people. All enjoy and be safe!@SkyAudiA4
